busytex dependencies:
texlive: \url{https://github.com/TeX-Live/texlive-source/archive/refs/heads/tags/texlive-2022.0.tar.gz} \url{http://mirrors.ctan.org/systems/texlive/Images/texlive2022-20220321.iso}
ubuntu packages: \url{https://packages.ubuntu.com/kinetic/}
expat: \url{https://github.com/libexpat/libexpat/releases/download/R_2_5_0/expat-2.5.0.tar.gz}
fontconfig: \url{https://www.freedesktop.org/software/fontconfig/release/fontconfig-2.13.96.tar.gz}
emscripten: 2.0.30
